first.quote: Kovcheg's help greatly facilitated my emigration. After moving to Armenia, together with the Ukrainian diaspora, we created a project that helps Ukrainian refugees
first.author: Anastasia, left Russia in March 2022, volunteer at Dopomoga.am project

second.quote: Kovcheg gave me a roof over my head when I was already living on the streets in Istanbul. This help is hard to overestimate: I was already depressed and could have lost my mind on the street

third.quote: Kovcheg's team of psychologists helped me tremendously when I was in despair and on the edge

aboutKovcheg.title: THE ARK UNITES
aboutKovcheg.description: Kovcheg was founded in March 2022 in response to the persecution of Russians who opposed the war in Ukraine. For two years now, we have been helping those who need it most

helped.textMarch1: temporary housing, counseling from lawyers and psychologists, a new language and opportunities.
helped.textMarch2: But thousands of people still need support!

finalCta.text: Every month, hundreds of people are forced to leave Russia due to their opposition to the war and repressions.
